description: Alterations/refurbishment of 89, 93-97 St. John Street and 26, 27 St. John's Lane, rebuilding/refurbishment of 91 St. John Street; formation of a central glazed ventilation tower; roof extensions to 89-97 St. John Street and 26 St. John's Lane and new dormer to 27 St. John's Lane; change of use of 97 St. John Street to A1/A3 use; the provision of seven self contained flats at 27 St. John's Lane with mixed office B1 use on the remainder of the site and the provision of a disabled link to St. John's Gate. APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  3 unnumbered A3 plans, 24C, 33C, 39B,40B, 41B, 54, 55,56B, 57, 06-09, SK01.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposal would be an overdevelopment of excessive bulk, out of scale with and detrimental to the character and appearance of the Clerkenwell Conservation Area and contrary to policies CS2, CS3 and CS4 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan.
